content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 24-31)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-5.0, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Partial pipe network (water)
- Small electric poles at (0.5, 8.5) and (3.5, 9.5)
- Missing boiler and steam engine components

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (set to produce sulfur, status: NO_POWER)
- Storage tank at (3.5, 12.5)
- Partial water pipe connection
- Missing petroleum gas input
- Missing power connection

### Oil Refinery at position (15.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Newly placed oil refinery (status: NO_POWER)
- No connections or supporting infrastructure yet

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Two offshore pumps at (-9.5, -0.5) and (-9.5, -2.5)
- Extensive pipe network with multiple pipe groups:
  - Working water pipes (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
  - Empty pipe sections (status: EMPTY)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent power issues
- Chemical plant and oil refinery remain without power
- Verify power pole connections and network coverage
- Complete electricity generation system (boiler + steam engine)

### Fluid connection problems
- Repeated "source does not have fluid" errors when connecting chemical plant
- Verify fluid presence in pipes before making connections
- Ensure proper fluid types throughout the network

### Placement distance issues
- Storage tank placement failed due to distance (12.98 tiles)
- Maintain awareness of player position relative to build targets
- Implement movement before distant placement attempts

### Entity existence checks
- Multiple failures when getting non-existent entities (storage tank, pumpjack)
- Implement defensive checks before entity interactions
- Verify entity positions before get_entity calls

### Petroleum gas production
- Chemical plant requires petroleum gas which isn't available
- Oil refinery needs to be properly set up and connected
- Implement complete oil processing chain

### Placement collision issues
- Burner inserter placement failed due to existing object
- Survey target area before placement attempts
- Consider alternative positions when collisions occur

### Pipe network management
- Some pipe groups remain empty despite connections
- Verify fluid flow direction and pressure
- Check for missing connections or blocked paths
